sermons.title: (Elijah Legacy) 5. God Who Answers by Fire
(Elijah Legacy) 6. Restoring the Altar of the Lord
(Elijah Legacy) 7. The Sound of Abundant Rain
(Hosea) Drawn with Gentle Cords
sermons.description: God had blessed Israel with an abundance of wealth and prosperity but they had squandered His blessing on themselves.  But the LOrd desired to draw Israel back to Himself with His love for them.  The Lord was like a parent to Israel who lovingly draws a child in their first uneasy steps.  Israel however did not want this and kept willfully backsliding away from God, they refused to repent of the sin they were now openly comitting before Him.  But despite this the Lord would not give up on them, He allowed them to go their own way but all the time was patient and longsuffering towards the nation.  This is a great illustration of the mercy and forgiveness of the Lord a thing we should be ever thankful for as He has also shown His great love for us in the death of His Son the Lord Jesus.

sermons.title: (Israel) In the Evening There Shall Be Light
A Baptism of Tears for Israel
sermons.description: Michael Brown delivers a piercing and burdening message calling the body of Christ to take the eternal reality of the unsaved seriously and allow God to grieve us for the salvation of the lost. By emphasizing Paul’s burden and heart wrenching desire for Israel, Dr. Brown shares both the closeness and hardness of Israel and reveals the need for a broken heart over all men.

sermons.title: A New Israel
sermons.description: The date delivered was 07/09/1969. This sermon was preached at the Atlantic States Christian Convocation, informally known as Wabanna. The Atlantic States Christian Convocations were held in the mid 1960s in Wabanna, Maryland. The speakers at the Wabanna conferences were typically, Devern Fromke, T. Austin-Sparks, and Stephen Kaung.

sermons.title: All Israel Shall Be Saved
sermons.description: This message is a passionate call to intercede for Israel with a persuasive explanation of their place in scripture, the end times and in God’s heart. Dr. Brown clearly denies replacement theology, but not with theological arguments but with a scriptural revelation of God’s relationship with His chosen people and His heart for those who are so close and yet so far from His grace.

sermons.title: An Overview of the Mystery of Israel
sermons.description: An expansive statement on the Mystery of Israel and the Church.  Probably Art’s best one-statement message on the subject.

sermons.title: Ezekiel 37
sermons.description: A shocking key of interpretation and understanding for present Israel.  Her death must precede her resurrection.

sermons.title: FINN-03 IsraelinTulevaKriisi (Israelâ€™s Future Time of Trouble)
FINN-04 Paluu ja Palauttaminen Israelin  (The Return and Restoration of Israel)
Fulfilling the Mystery of Israel - Part 1
sermons.description: Drawing from Romans chapter 11, Art shows that the Jew has not been cast away, and that there is a divine purpose in the necessary but temporary setting aside of this people.

sermons.title: Fulfilling the Mystery of Israel - Part 2
sermons.description: Drawing from Romans chapter 11, Art shows that the Jew has not been cast away, and that there is a divine purpose in the necessary but temporary setting aside of this people.

sermons.title: Genesis #19 Ch. 29:31 - Ch. 31:14 The Sons of Israel
HOLL-01 The Necessary Death of Israel
HOLL-09 Israel in the Cosmic Drama
How God Provided For the Children of Israel
Israel & the shaking of the Nations Pt1
Israel & the shaking of the Nations Pt2
Israel Gods banner to the world
Israel and the End Times (Time Square Church)
Israel in Flight
sermons.description: A commentary on Amos chapter 9 that suggests a soon coming flight of world Jewry through all nations in the necessary dealing of God to bring His ancient people back to Himself and into their Millennial glory.

sermons.title: Israel, the "Servant - Son"
sermons.description: Israel is called to be like its Messiah and Lord before it - a nation of priests and a light unto the world. Is that needful in the world today? Another expression of this inexhaustible theme. Nothing measures our relationship with God more accurately than our understanding, disposition and heart toward the people whom God has chosen.

sermons.title: K-086 The Mystery of Israel and the Church
K-463 Death and Resurrection of Israel (1 of 2)
sermons.description: Speaking from Ezekiel 37, Art shows that the resurrection of Jesus has everything to do with a future fulfillment of a covenant promise made to the nation Israel, but only out of their own “death and resurrection.” A 1993 message.

sermons.title: K-464 Death and Resurrection of Israel (2 of 2)
sermons.description: Speaking from Ezekiel 37, Art shows that the resurrection of Jesus has everything to do with a future fulfillment of a covenant promise made to the nation Israel, but only out of their own “death and resurrection.” A 1993 message.

sermons.title: K-467 Godâ€™s Purpose for Israel and the Church
sermons.description: Speaking from Ezekiel 37, Art makes the point that present-day Israel, in its apostate condition, serves and will yet serve the purposes of God for the church. A 1991 message.

sermons.title: K-479 Israel in Exile
sermons.description: In the light of God’s covenant faithfulness to Israel, Art seeks to find an answer her past expulsions from the Land in order to understand the necessity of a yet-future expulsion. A 1994 message.

sermons.title: K-480 Israel in the Purpose of God
K-481 The Union of the Church and Israel
K-505 Israel as the Missing Key
sermons.description: Speaking from Romans 11, Art shows that our continuing ignorance of the mystery of Israel may well be the revelation of the truth of our lack of union with God.  A 1995 message.

sermons.title: K-535 The Consummation of Israel and the Church
Making Part stand for Whole
sermons.description: When we regard the church as the thing in itself apart from Israel, that is, by disregarding the centrality of Israel in God's purposes, we are "making the part stand for the whole." God is just as much jealous for the whole faith as He is for the whole truth.

Mid South Conference 1981-03 The People Of Israel
Mid South Conference 1981-04 The People Of Israel
Mid South Conference 1981-05 The People Of Israel
Mid South Conference 1981-06 The People Of Israel

sermons.title: The Mystery of Israel (A 1999 convocation tape)
sermons.description: Art probes the perplexity of the mystery of Israel given in Romans 11 and Psalm 102.  It is a mystery that profoundly affects the contemporary Gentile church and the only mystery that carries a penalty for our willful ignorance of it.
